content:
Play when you take damage.

Until the start of your next turn, any damage that would reduce you to 0 Hit Points leaves you with 1 Hit Point remaining and gives you the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Doomed]{Doomed 1} condition, or increases your doomed value by 1 if you're already doomed. As usual, you die when your doomed condition equals the dying value that would kill you (usually doomed 4).
name: Last Stand
